mapper.sql: EMPID, EMPCODE, OPERATORID, USERID, EMPNAME, REALNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDATE, POSITION, EMPSTATUS, CARDTYPE, CARDNO, INDATE, OUTDATE, OTEL, OADDRESS, OZIPCODE, OEMAIL, FAXNO, MOBILENO, MSN, HTEL, HADDRESS, HZIPCODE, PEMAIL, PARTY, DEGREE, MAJOR, SPECIALTY, WORKEXP, REGDATE, CREATETIME, LASTMODYTIME, ORGIDLIST, ORGID, REMARK, EDUCATION, LICENSENO, INTOTRADEDATE, RUNMARKDATE, EMPLEVEL, DEPARTMENT_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE AC_OPERATOR T SET T.STATUS = #{status} WHERE T.USERID = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into om_emporg select t1.orgid,t1.empid,'1' from om_employee t1 where t1.empcode = #{empcode}

insert into OM_EMPLOYEE (EMPID, EMPCODE, OPERATORID, USERID, EMPNAME, REALNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDATE, POSITION, EMPSTATUS, CARDTYPE, CARDNO, INDATE, OUTDATE, OTEL, OADDRESS, OZIPCODE, OEMAIL, FAXNO, MOBILENO, MSN, HTEL, HADDRESS, HZIPCODE, PEMAIL, PARTY, DEGREE, MAJOR, SPECIALTY, WORKEXP, REGDATE, CREATETIME, LASTMODYTIME, ORGIDLIST, ORGID, REMARK, EDUCATION, LICENSENO, INTOTRADEDATE, RUNMARKDATE, EMPLEVEL, DEPARTMENT_ID ) values (#{empid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{empcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{empstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{otel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ozipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{haddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{party,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmodytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgidlist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intotradedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{runmarkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{emplevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update OM_EMPLOYEE
EMPCODE = #{empcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPNAME = #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDATE = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPSTATUS = #{empstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDTYPE = #{cardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDNO = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDATE = #{indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OUTDATE = #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OTEL = #{otel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OADDRESS = #{oaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OZIPCODE = #{ozipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OEMAIL = #{oemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAXNO = #{faxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILENO = #{mobileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSN = #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HTEL = #{htel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HADDRESS = #{haddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HZIPCODE = #{hzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PEMAIL = #{pemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTY = #{party,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SPECIALTY = #{specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKEXP = #{workexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGDATE = #{regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMODYTIME = #{lastmodytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORGIDLIST = #{orgidlist,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATION = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSENO = #{licenseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTOTRADEDATE = #{intotradedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RUNMARKDATE = #{runmarkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMPLEVEL = #{emplevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where EMPID = #{empid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OM_EMPLOYEE set EMPCODE = #{empcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPNAME = #{empname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDATE = #{birthdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMPSTATUS = #{empstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDTYPE = #{cardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDNO = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDATE = #{indate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OUTDATE = #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OTEL = #{otel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OADDRESS = #{oaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OZIPCODE = #{ozipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OEMAIL = #{oemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAXNO = #{faxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILENO = #{mobileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSN = #{msn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTEL = #{htel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HADDRESS = #{haddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HZIPCODE = #{hzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PEMAIL = #{pemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTY = #{party,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPECIALTY = #{specialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKEXP = #{workexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGDATE = #{regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMODYTIME = #{lastmodytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORGIDLIST = #{orgidlist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATION = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSENO = #{licenseno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTOTRADEDATE = #{intotradedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RUNMARKDATE = #{runmarkdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMPLEVEL = #{emplevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EMPID = #{empid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
